member.name: T:CODE.Framework.Wpf.Theme.Metro.Classes.AvailabilityToVisibilityConverter
member.summary: Converts view action availability to visibility

member.name: M:CODE.Framework.Wpf.Theme.Metro.Classes.AvailabilityToVisibilityConverter.Convert(System.Object,System.Type,System.Object,System.Globalization.CultureInfo)
member.param: The value produced by the binding source.
The type of the binding target property.
The culture to use in the converter.
member.returns: A converted value. If the method returns null, the valid null value is used.

member.name: M:CODE.Framework.Wpf.Theme.Metro.Classes.AvailabilityToVisibilityConverter.ConvertBack(System.Object,System.Type,System.Object,System.Globalization.CultureInfo)
member.param: The value that is produced by the binding target.
The culture to use in the converter.
member.returns: A converted value. If the method returns null, the valid null value is used.

member.name: T:CODE.Framework.Wpf.Theme.Metro.Classes.ContextBindingDummy
member.summary: Invisible object used to bind elements together that are otherwise not directly bindable

member.name: M:CODE.Framework.Wpf.Theme.Metro.Classes.ContextBindingDummy.UpdateDestination(System.Windows.DependencyObject,System.Windows.DependencyPropertyChangedEventArgs)
member.param: The instance containing the event data.

member.name: T:CODE.Framework.Wpf.Theme.Metro.Classes.HorizontalScrollEnabledToVisibilityConverter
member.summary: Converts the ability to scroll horizontally to visibility

member.name: M:CODE.Framework.Wpf.Theme.Metro.Classes.HorizontalScrollEnabledToVisibilityConverter.Convert(System.Object[],System.Type,System.Object,System.Globalization.CultureInfo)
member.summary: Converts source values to a value for the binding target. The data binding engine calls this method when it propagates the values from source bindings to the binding target.
member.param: The array of values that the source bindings in the produces. The value indicates that the source binding has no value to provide for conversion.
The type of the binding target property.
The culture to use in the converter.
member.returns: A converted value.If the method returns null, the valid null value is used.A return value of . indicates that the converter did not produce a value, and that the binding will use the if it is available, or else will use the default value.A return value of . indicates that the binding does not transfer the value or use the or the default value.

member.name: M:CODE.Framework.Wpf.Theme.Metro.Classes.HorizontalScrollEnabledToVisibilityConverter.ConvertBack(System.Object,System.Type[],System.Object,System.Globalization.CultureInfo)
member.summary: Converts a binding target value to the source binding values.
member.param: The value that the binding target produces.
The array of types to convert to. The array length indicates the number and types of values that are suggested for the method to return.
The culture to use in the converter.
member.returns: An array of values that have been converted from the target value back to the source values.

member.remarks: For the progress animation to be displayed, the IsActive must be true, and the control must have its visibility set to visible.

member.summary: Indicates whether the progress animation is active
